title: Swipe Right
description: Even billionaires lie on their dating profiles.Jules wasn’t looking for a new romance, but when the annoying little app she should have deleted sends her the picture of a gorgeous musician, she changes her mind. Who knows? A quick fling might be just what she needs to take her mind off the drudgery of corporate life.Caleb just wanted an uncomplicated one-night stand, preferably with someone who doesn’t know he’s the wealthy tech wizard who created the hottest new dating app. And growing out his hair and beard to explore his true passion of playing with the band has given him the perfect cover.But when the girl with the big brown eyes and dreams of being a professional photographer tugs at his heart, the hookup shakes up his life. Will Caleb be able to come clean before he ruins it all?Find out what happens when you tell … a sexy little lie.
author: Peyton Fuller
